name: BirdsBorough: Town of Alchemy
description:
*THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY VERY EARLY ACCESS CERTAIN FEATURES ARE MISSING/NOT FULLY DEVELOPED - UPDATES WILL BE FREQUENT*

After mysterious events a run down potion shop has found it's way into your possession! The people of BirdsBorough have many unique problems for you to solve but you can create just as many unique potions brewed with various properties and powers. As you grow close to the people of BirdsBorough you may learn more secrets of this mysterious town you find yourself....

Current features:
- Procedurally Generated dialogue and problems for you to solve.

- over 27 potential potion effects to combine in any way you see fit.

- all potion effects have clear, sometimes extreme effects on shoppers when drunk

- building system with various decorations, shelves and structural elements to build your perfect potion store.


I am a small indie dev and your support means a lot and allows me to continue developing BirdsBorough, while currently in early access updates will be frequent and many features including more herbs, more decor, Unique Npcs and factions will all be added over the following months!
